name: Please don't sleep!
description:
We all need to complete the work on time. Especially when it comes to LUDUM DARE 50! Try to complete game development for games jam and stay awake!

Use PIZZA and COFFEE to get ENERGY, don't forget to go to the BATHROOM. You will be disturbed by noxious neighbors but the job must be done!

Is it possible to delay the inevitable and still stay awake?

– WASD or arrows to move

– E to interact

– ESC to quit the action

PRO TIP: Monitor WC indicator. You won't be able to WORK or EAT until you're relieved.

LD#50 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$282417
